attributes.action: STOP THE DVLA SELLING DRIVER DETAILS TO PRIVATE COMPANIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I HAVE NO PROBLEMS WITH THE POLICE NEEDING DRIVER INFORMATION, I THINK IT WRONG THAT PRIVATE COMPANIES, (PRIVATE PARKING ENFORCEMENT ETC) WHO DELIBERATELY ABUSE THE DVLA DATABASE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
